AD.name: Endpoint URL Root
AD.description: Service URL Root for the Webtools API

AD.name: Arinc600 Components URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for arinc600 components

AD.name: Arinc600 Packaging URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for arinc600 packages

AD.name: Backshell Metadata URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for backshell metadata

AD.name: Backshell Partbuild URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for Backshell Partbuild

AD.name: Free sample Endpoint
AD.description: Service URL part for Backshell Partbuild

AD.name: Webtools Password
AD.description: Service Password for Basic Authentication. Should be encrypted with crypto service

AD.name: Max Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed overall. This value only applies to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Max Host Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration. These values only apply to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Arinc600 Packaging URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for arinc600 packages
